main.name: Jean Pierre Barnett
main.description: I am a web development engineer and I use react and vue.js to develop pages. This project is a resume template that can be used as the project home page or resume page
main.bio: I consider myself passionate about magnetic fields, I am a self taught programmer with experience in python projects due I will make a autonomous vehicle with Artificial inteligenceI to controller all the vehicle and develop the motor with radial and axial technologies. I can resolved differents issues in others code and solved for myself. I can work under pressure and work efficiently individually or with a team. I like to learn about everything around me and I accept all feedback in a good way in order to improve professionally.
main.contactmessage: Here is my personal information if you need contact with me please let me know.

education.description: It covers fields such as: analog electronics, digital electronics, consumer electronics, embedded systems and power electronics. It is also involved in many related fields, for example solid-state physics, radio engineering, telecommunications, control systems, signal processing, systems engineering, computer engineering, instrumentation engineering, electric power control, robotics. - Advanced courses in accounting, economics, finance, management, marketing, strategic management, supply chain management.
